A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I started an acct with RT just to post this.  never posted a review before but very upset.  1/2 star just because it was star wars. Was DISAPPOINTED!!  Vice Admiral Amilyn Holdo's speech was so lame and Laura Dern was miscast  Same with DJ\, horrible; his scenes were the worst.  Reminded me of how I felt with JarJar.  The whole casino sequence was terrible.   Finns character just seemed like he was set on a lame adventure to fill time. Lei flying in space was LAME/bordered on a Saturday Night Live spoof.  Luke/Mark Hamill was great as well as Kylo/Adam Driver.  Rey and Poe were enjoyable to watch as well.  I am a huge STAR WARS fan but I thought the FORCE was not with the movie.  SAD.  RIP Carrie Fisher.I am Asian and ROSE was lame.  Weak character.  the KISS was LAME.
